name: Python Impact_Prologue
description:
Who (Characters)：

Protagonist, a college freshman from UC, Irvine without any programming experience stepping into the world of Python by accident, now his/her goal is to explore the continents and search for seven keys from the legend. When the seven keys are found and embedded into the slates on the Mountain of Chirekan, the gate to the underworld will open. The protagonist needs to defeat the Lord of Shadow (final Boss) in order to save the world of Python and return to the original world.

 

Sager, a wise old man who saved the protagonist from river through fishing and introduced context and background since Lord of Shadow has taken control of the world of Python.

 

When:

2023 AD Fall

 

Where:

The world of Python with seven unique continents

 

What:

The protagonist should firstly learn the knowledge and contents about Python from NPCs (the direct teaching) in the game, and then practice to master all of them through completing weekly assignments of ICS31 for corresponding quests (scenario learning) in order to advance the story plots.

 

Why:

After mastering to be able to apply all the knowledge and contents of Python through the adventure in this game, the protagonist finally collects the 7 keys and open the gate to underworld. Finally, the protagonist defeats the Lord of Shadow and saves the world of Python. With the cheers and hymns, the protagonist returns to his/her original world, and to face the final trial in ICS-31: Final Exam.
